title: Thick Borders and recolored water - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Thick Borders and recolored water - Europa Universalis IV mod


If ur savegame doesnt show up after update 1.2, you have to tick "show incompatible savegames" and start ur savegame from there (you only have to do it once, after you save your savegame again, it will show up normally).

Hello, this is my graphical modification of EU4

It changes: 
* Border are now much more thicker. Borders are now visible from a greater distance. 
* Sharp black borders that change width according to zoom level. 
* More beautiful terrain, new textures of sand, rock, grass with changes normal-maps. 
* Recolored water with semi-reflection (When zoomed in, reflection of clouds appear, when zoomed out, reflection is minimal). 

Its fully compatible with IRONMAN!
